contact.name: contact

previous.help: Press here if you would like to go back to the previous form

introduction.text: Interested in creating an app like this? Drop me a line!
Last step. Remember, this is a demo app.

failure.text: Our contact service is temporarily unavailable. Please consider emailing your message to us directly, or click the retry button.
failure.help: For reference, this was your message:

success.text: Your message has been sent. I'll be in touch with you within 48 hours.
